utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can't believe you would actually say that. I would much rather be Mr.Peanut than Mr.Salty.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No way! Mr.Salty is a sailor, all right, he's got to be, like, thetoughest snack there is.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't know, you don't wanna mess with corn nuts. They're craaazy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God. You guys! You gotta come see this! There's some creep out there with a telescope!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't believe it! He's looking right at us!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, that is so sick.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I feel violated. And not in a good way.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How can people do that?... Oh, you guys, look! Ugly Naked Guy got gravity boots!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I am telling you, years from now, schoolchildren will study it as one of the greatest first dates of all time. It was unbelievable! We could totally be ourselves, we didn't have to play any games...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So have you called her yet?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Let her know I like her? What are you, insane? It's the next day! How needy do I want to seem? I'm right, right?

utterance.speaker: Joey and Ross
utterance.content: Oh, yeah. Yeah. Let her dangle.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can't believe my parents are actually pressuring me to find one of you people.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, God, just do it! Call her! Stop being so testosteroney!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Which, by the way, is the real San Francisco treat. I got her machine.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Her answer machine?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, interestingly enough her leaf blower picked up.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So, uh, why didn't you say anything?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, no-no-no-no. Last time I left a spontaneous message I ended up using the phrase "Yes indeedy-o."

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look look! It's Rachel and Barry. No, don't everybody look at once!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, okay, what's going on?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, they're just talking...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, well, does he look upset? Does he look like he was just told to shove anything?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, no actually, he's smiling.. and... Oh my God, don't do that!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? What? What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That man across the street just kicked that pigeon! Oh!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And basically, that's how a bill becomes a law.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Oh!... Right!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Rach!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How'd it go?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y'know, it was, uh.. it was actually really great. He took me to lunch at the Russian Tea Room, and I had that chicken, where y'know you poke it and all the butter squirts out...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Not a good day for birds...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Then we took a walk down to Bendall's, and I told him not to, but he got me a little bottle of Chanel...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's nice... now, was that before or after you told him to stop calling, stop sending you flowers and to generally leave you alone, hmm?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Right,.. well,.. we never actually got to that... Oh, it was just so nice to see him again, y'know? It was comfortable, it was familiar... it was just nice!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's, that's nice twice!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel, what's going on? I mean isn't this the same Barry who you left at the altar?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Duh, where've you been?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, but it was different with him today! And he wasn't, like, Orthodontist Guy, y'know? I mean, we had fun! Is there anything wrong with that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I have my reasons.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, how about the fact that he's engaged to another woman, who just happens to be your ex-best friend?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right. All right, all right, all right, all right, I know it's stupid! I will go see him this afternoon, and I will just put an end to it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow... Wow!

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm not crazy, right? I mean, it was never like that.

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: Nooo, it wasn't.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ooh, and it's so nice having this little sink here...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, Danielle! I wasn't expecting the machine... Give me a call when you get a chance. Bye-bye. Oh God!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's what you've been working on for the past two hours?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, I've been honing!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What was with the dishes?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, uh.. I want her to think I might be in a restaurant.. y'know? I might have some kind of life, like I haven't been sitting around here honing for the past few hours.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look look! He's doing it again, the guy with the telescope!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! Go away! Stop looking in here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Great, now he's waving back.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Man, we gotta do something about that guy. This morning, I caught him looking into our apartment. It creeps me out! I feel like I can't do stuff!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What kinda stuff?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Will you grow up? I'm not talking about sexy stuff, but, like, when I'm cooking naked.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You cook naked?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, toast, oatmeal... nothing that spatters.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What are you looking at me for? I didn't know that.

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: What's the matter?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, it's just... Oh, Barry, this was not good.

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: No, it was. It was very very good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, what about Mindy?

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: Oh, way, way better than Mindy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, not that, I mean, what about you and Mindy?

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: Well, if you want, I'll just—I'll just break it off with her.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. No-no-no-no, no. I mean, don't do that. Not, I mean not for me.

utterance.speaker: Bernice
utterance.content: Dr. Farber, Bobby Rush is here for his adjustment.

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: Thanks, Bernice. Let's go away this weekend.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, Barry..! Come on, this is all way too..

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: We can, we can go to Aruba! When I went there on what would have been our honeymoon, it was, uh... it was really nice. You would've liked it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I had a bra.

utterance.speaker: Bobby
utterance.content: Hey, Dr. Farber.

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: All right Miss Green, everything looks fine... Yep, I think we're starting to see some real progress here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Bobby
utterance.content: I'm twelve, I'm not stupid.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Can I use your phone?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.. uh, but for future reference, that thing in your hand can also be used as a phone.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, it's working! Why isn't she calling me back?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Maybe she never got your message.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y'know, if you want, you can call her machine, and if she has a lot of beeps, that means she probably didn't get her messages yet.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'don't think that makes me seem a little...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: ...desperate, needy, pathetic?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ah, you obviously saw my personal ad.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How many beeps?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She answered.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'see, this is where you'd use that 'hello' word we talked about.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm not gonna talk to her, she obviously got my message and is choosing not to call me. Now I'm needy and snubbed. God, I miss just being needy.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey! Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How'd he take it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Pretty well, actually...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh, Rach... how come you have dental floss in your hair?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, do I?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh huh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: We ended up having sex in his chair.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You had sex in his chair?!... I said that a little too loudly, didn't I?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You-you had what?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sex in his chair.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What, uh... what were you thinking?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't know! I mean, we still care about each other. There's a history there. 'S'like you and Carol.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No no, it is nothing like me and Carol!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Please. If she said to you, "Ross, I want you on this couch, right here, right now," what would you say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If it helps, I could slide over.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's, it's, it's, uh, a totally diferent situation! It's, it's apples and oranges, it's, it's orthodontists and lesbi- I gotta go.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Where are you going?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I just have to go, all right? Do I need a reason? Huh? I mean I have things to do with my life, I have a jam packed schedule, and I am late- for keeping up with it. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hello? Hello?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello? Mindy! Hi! Hey, how are you? Yes, yes, I've heard, congratulations, that is so great. Really? Oh. Okay. Okay, well I'm working tomorrow, but if you want you can, you can, you can come by and... Okay... Great... Great... All right, so I'll, so I'll see you tomorrow! Okay.. Okay... Bye. Oh God. Oh God. Oh God.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So how's Mindy?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, she wants to see me tomorrow...Oh, she sounded really weird, I gotta call Barry... Hi, it's me, I just.. Mindy!! Mindy! Hi! No, I figured that's where you'd be!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Brrrrrrr!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hell is filled with people like you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He's back! The peeper's back!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Get down!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Get down?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ...And boogie!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thanks, but I gotta go to work and get my eyes scratched out by Mindy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Relax. Y'know, she may not even know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Please. I haven't heard from her in seven months, and now she calls me? I mean, what else is it about? Oh! She was my best friend, you guys! We went to camp together... she taught me how to kiss..

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And now, y'know, I'm like... I'm like the other woman! I feel so..

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: ..Naughty!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Right, I'll see you guys later...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, hold up, I'll walk out with you. Now, Rach, when she taught you to kiss, you were at camp, and.. were you wearing any kinda little uniform, or- That's fine, yeah...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, I'm gonna go to the bathroom. Will you watch my phone?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why don't you just take it with you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, we haven't been on a second date, she needs to hear me pee?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why don't you just call her?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can't call her, I left a message! I have some pride.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! Danielle, hi! It's, uh, it's Chandler! I'm fine. Uh, listen, I don't know if you tried to call me, because, uh, idiot that I am, I accidentally shut off my phone. Oh, uh, okay, that's fine, that's great. Okay. She's on the other line, she's gonna call me back. She's on the other line, she's gonna call me back, she's on the other line, gonna call me back...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Don't you have to pee?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: 'S'why I'm dancing...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Mindy.

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Hey, you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, you.... So, what's up?

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Um.. we should really be sitting for this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sure we should... So.

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Now, I know things've been weird lately, but you're like my oldest friend in the world... Except for maybe Laurie Schaffer, who I don't talk to anywhere, 'cause she's all bitter now that she lost the weight and it turns out she doesn't have a pretty face. ....Okay, I'm just gonna ask you this once, and I want a straight answer.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Will you be my maid of honour?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Of course!

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Oh that's so great!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Was that all you wanted to ask me?

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: That's all!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhhh!! ...What? What?

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: That's not all.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh sure it is!

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Oh no, it isn't! No! I think Barry is seeing someone in the city.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Um, what- what would make you think that?

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Well, ever since we announced the engagement, he's been acting really weird, and then last night, he came home smelling like Chanel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really. Mindy, if it'll make you feel any better, when I was engaged to him he went through a whole weird thing too.

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Oh God! You see, that's what I was afraid of!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? What's what you were afraid of?

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Okay, okay... when Barry was engaged to you, he and I...kind of... had a little thing on the side.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: I know. I know, and when he proposed to me, everyone said "Don't do it, he's just gonna do to you what he did to Rachel," and now I feel so stupid.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh... Oh, Mindy, you are so stupid. Oh, we are both so stupid.

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Smell familiar?

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Oh no.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I am so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: No me, I am so sorry...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Four letters: "Circle or hoop".

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ring dammit, ring!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, you know our phone's not working?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I tried to call you from the coffee shop, and there was no answer.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I turned it off. Mother of God, I turned it off!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Just like you told her you did! ... Just pointing out the irony.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, so listen, I went across the street and talked to the doorman- I got the peeper's name! Can I use the phone?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Nngghhh!!!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Can I use your phone? Yeah, the number for a Sidney Marks, please.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: "Heating device."

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Radiator.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Five letters.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rdtor.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, is Sidney there? Oh, this is? Sidney's a woman.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So she's a woman! So what?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah, so what? Look, I live across the street, and I know all about you and your little telescope, and I don't appreciate it, okay? Yeah, I can see you right now! Hello! If I wanna walk around my apartment in my underwear, I shouldn't have to feel like——Thank you, but... that's not really the point... The point is that... Mostly free weights, but occasionally..

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, my neighbor... Yeah, the brunette... She says you looked very pretty the other day in the green dress.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The green dress? Really?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, she said you looked like Ingrid Bergman that day.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nooo!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey. Got a second?

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: Sure, sure. Come on... ...in...

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Hello, sweetheart.

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: Uh... uh... what're'you... what're'you guys doing here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh, we are here to break up with you.

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: Both of you?

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Basically, we think you're a horrible human being, and bad things should happen to you.

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: I'm sorry... I'm sorry, God, I am so sorry, I'm an idiot, I was weak, I couldn't help myself! Whatever I did, I only did because I love you so much!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh- which one of us are you talking to there, Barr?

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: ....Mindy. Mindy, of course Mindy, it was always Mindy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Even when we were having sex in that chair?

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: I swear, whatever I was doing, I was always thinking of you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Please! During that second time you couldn't have picked her out of a lineup!

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: You did it twice?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, the first time didn't really count... I mean, y'know, 's'Barry.

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Okay...

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: Sweetheart, just gimme- gimme another chance, okay, we'll start all over again. We'll go back to Aruba.

utterance.speaker: Bernice
utterance.content: Dr. Farber, we've got a bit of an emergency here...Jason Costalano is choking on his retainer.

utterance.speaker: Barry
utterance.content: Oh God... I'll be right there, Bernice. Look, please, please don't go anywhere, okay? I'll be, I'll be right back.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Okay, we'll be here! Hating you! Did you see how he was sweating when he walked out of there? Listen honey, if I'm hogging the ball too much you just jump right in there and take a couple punches because I'm telling you, this feels great.

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Yeah... I'm pretty sure I'm still gonna marry him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What are you talking about?! Mindy, the guy is the devil! He's Satan in a smock!

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: Look, I know he's not perfect, but the truth is, at the end of the day, I still really wanna be Mrs. Dr. Barry Farber, D.D.S.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God.

utterance.speaker: Mindy
utterance.content: I hope you can find some way to be happy for me. And I hope you'll still be my maid of honor...?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And I hope Barry doesn't kill you and eat you in Aruba.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! Y'know, ever since I ran out on Barry at the wedding, I have wondered whether I made the right choice. And now I know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Aww...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Big day.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, I'll give you this, Mr. Peanut is a better dresser. I mean he's got the monocle, he's got the top hat...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You know he's gay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I just wanna clarify this: are you outing Mr. Peanut?

utterance.speaker: Danielle
utterance.content: Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Danielle! Hi! Uh- everybody, this is Danielle, Danielle, everybody.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hi. Hi.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Danielle
utterance.content: Well, I've been calling you, but it turns out I had your number wrong. And when I finally got the right one from Information, there was no answer. So I thought I'd just come down here, and make sure you were okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ...I'm, I'm okay.

utterance.speaker: Danielle
utterance.content: Listen uh, maybe we could get together later?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That sounds good. I'll call you- or you call me, whatever...

utterance.speaker: Danielle
utterance.content: You got it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Danielle
utterance.content: G'bye, everybody.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Whoo-hoo!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, there you go!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Second date!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ...I dunno.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You don't know?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, she seems very nice and everything, but that whole thing about her coming all the way down here, just to see if I was okay? I mean,... how needy is that?
